Key Match Events: Hardik Pandya starred with both bat and ball
Indian batting lineup scored 196 runs for the loss of 5 wickets
Bangladesh restricted to 146/8 in their 20 overs
Pre-Game Insights: Bangladesh captain Najmul Shanto opted to bat first in a day game
Before the toss, Harsha Bhogle predicted the pitch would get progressively slower as the sun took its toll on the wicket
Post-Match Reflections: India has one foot into the semi-finals spots with a massive NRR boost
India will qualify for the semi-final if Afghanistan beats Australia on June 23
Miscellaneous Highlights: Tanzid Hasan Shakib was the pick amongst the bowlers, taking 2/32 from his 4 overs
Rishad Hossain picked 2 wickets but was expensive, leaking 43 off his 4 overs
Others: India put up their most complete performance in the tournament so far
